1.text: Prep your nails by filing and buffing them.

2.vid: /0/02/Do a Manicure with Sharpie and Mirror Powder Step 2 Version 3.360p.mp4

3.text: Apply 1 to 2 coats of your favorite nail polish color.
3.vid: /9/9a/Do a Manicure with Sharpie and Mirror Powder Step 3 Version 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Let your nail polish dry or cure.

5.vid: /d/d8/Do a Manicure with Sharpie and Mirror Powder Step 5 Version 3.360p.mp4

6.text: Let the top coat dry or cure.

7.text: Dip the tip of a foam, eyeshadow brush into the mirror powder.
7.vid: /a/ad/Do a Manicure with Sharpie and Mirror Powder Step 7 Version 3.360p.mp4

8.text: Gently tap the powder onto your nail, starting from the cuticle and working your way to the tip.
8.vid: /1/12/Do a Manicure with Sharpie and Mirror Powder Step 8 Version 3.360p.mp4

10.text: Brush off the excess with a soft, fluffy, eyeshadow brush.

11.text: Add a no-wipe or water-based top coat and let it cure or dry.
11.vid: /3/3a/Do a Manicure with Sharpie and Mirror Powder Step 11 Version 3.360p.mp4

12.text: Find something to use as a palette.

13.text: Choose two to three colors of Sharpie.

14.text: Draw patches of color on your palette.
14.vid: /b/ba/Do a Manicure with Sharpie and Mirror Powder Step 14 Version 3.360p.mp4

15.text: Spray or drop some 91% rubbing alcohol onto the color patches.
15.vid: /2/2a/Do a Manicure with Sharpie and Mirror Powder Step 15 Version 3.360p.mp4

16.text: Use a thin brush the mix the rubbing alcohol into the Sharpie.
16.vid: /b/b6/Do a Manicure with Sharpie and Mirror Powder Step 16 Version 3.360p.mp4

17.text: Use a thin brush to paint your first color in small patches onto your nails.
17.vid: /e/e5/Do a Manicure with Sharpie and Mirror Powder Step 17 Version 3.360p.mp4

18.text: Paint on your other color(s) in small patches.
18.vid: /0/0f/Do a Manicure with Sharpie and Mirror Powder Step 18 Version 3.360p.mp4

19.text: Wait for the Sharpie to dry.

20.text: Apply a layer of top coat and let it dry or cure.
20.vid: /f/f0/Do a Manicure with Sharpie and Mirror Powder Step 20 Version 3.360p.mp4

21.text: Consider adding some more designs, then seal them using more top coat.
21.vid: /0/07/Do a Manicure with Sharpie and Mirror Powder Step 21 Version 3.360p.mp4
